entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
